name: David Rathaus
description:
This is a game that sucks.  It was supposed to be about Dungeons & Dragons, but I failed to design the premise around my strengths, which is architecture and level design.

You were supposed to move your game piece around the board and knock it into enemies to fling them off the board.  Instead pieces just kind of move aside for your piece and I don't know why.  I hate programming.
